panels.description: Displays the current PodDisruptionBudget setting that is applied globally to all deployments in OVERNIGHT_UNPINNED_DEPLOYMENTS, all other deployments are always pinned (e.g. max unavalable is set to 0). Setting max unavailable to 1 means pods can be moved to different nodes to enable binpacking, setting it to 0 pins it to the node it's currently running on.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_pdb_max_unavailable")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
    |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Kubernetes PodDisruptionBudget - Max Unavailable

panels.description: For each of the worker deployments, displays amount of time that has elapsed since there were any new activity in any of the queues the worker follows

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_time_since_activity")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
    |> group(columns: ["deployment"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Time Since Deployment Activity

panels.description: For the 'Engine RQ' workers, displays the replica limit and the counts of both the desired replicas (requested by autoscaler) and the active replicas (running in k8s)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_active_replicas" or r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_desired_replicas" or r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_replica_limit")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deployment"] =~ /engine/)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
    |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "deployment"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Engine RQ Worker Autoscaling

panels.description: For the 'Model Trainer RQ' workers, displays the replica limit and the counts of both the desired replicas (requested by autoscaler) and the active replicas (running in k8s)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_active_replicas" or r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_desired_replicas" or r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_replica_limit")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deployment"] =~ /model-trainer/)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
    |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "deployment"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Model Trainer RQ Worker Autoscaling

panels.description: For the 'Engine Ray' workers, displays the replica limit and the counts of both the desired replicas (requested by autoscaler) and the active replicas (running in k8s)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_active_replicas" or r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_desired_replicas" or r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_replica_limit")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deployment"] =~ /ray-(gpu-)?worker/)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
    |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "deployment"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Engine Ray Worker Autoscaling

panels.description: For each of the autoscaled deployments, displays the diff (desired - active) of the replica counts, and alerts if the discrepancy is > 0 or < 0 for an extended period of time

targets.query:
active_replicas = from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_active_replicas")

desired_replicas = from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "autoscaler_deployment_desired_replicas")

active_desired_joined = join(
    tables: {
        active_replicas:active_replicas,
        desired_replicas:desired_replicas
    },
    on: ["_time", "deployment"]
)

active_desired_joined
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _value: int(v: r._value_desired_replicas - r._value_active_replicas)
        }))
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "deployment"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Autoscaler Health
